+           <p>æŠ±æ­‰ï¼Œæ‚¨è®¿é—®çš„äº§å“ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–å·²è¢«åˆ é™¤ã€‚</p>

+ <script>
+ import { ref, computed, onMounted, watch } from 'vue'
+ import { useRouter } from 'vue-router'
+ import InquiryModal from './InquiryModal.vue'
+ import { getProduct } from '@/api/product'
+ import { getCategories } from '@/api/category'
+ import { getImageUrl, getProductImages } from '@/utils/imageUtils'
+ 
+ export default {
+   name: 'ProductDetailModal',
+   components: {
+     InquiryModal
+   },
+   props: {
+     visible: {
+       type: Boolean,
+       default: false
+     },
+     productId: {
+       type: [String, Number],
+       required: true
+     }
+   },
+   emits: ['close', 'success'],
+   setup(props, { emit }) {
+     const router = useRouter()
+     
+     const loading = ref(true)
+     const product = ref({})
+     const categories = ref([])
+     const currentImageIndex = ref(0)
+     const imageDisplayMode = ref('contain')
+     
+     // è¯¢ä»·ç›¸å…³
+     const showInquiry = ref(false)
+ 
+     const currentImage = computed(() => {
+       if (product.value.images && product.value.images.length > 0) {
+         return product.value.images[currentImageIndex.value]
+       }
+       return null
+     })
+     
+     const categoryName = computed(() => {
+       if (!product.value.category_id) return ''
+       const category = categories.value.find(cat => cat.id === product.value.category_id)
+       return category ? category.name : ''
+     })
+ 
+     const loadProduct = async () => {
+       try {
+         loading.value = true
+         const response = await getProduct(props.productId)
+         product.value = response.data
+         currentImageIndex.value = 0
+         
+         // åº”ç”¨äº§å“è¯¦æƒ…å›¾ç‰‡æ ·å¼
+         applyDetailImageStyles()
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åŠ è½½äº§å“å¤±è´¥:', error)
+         product.value = {}
+       } finally {
+         loading.value = false
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const loadCategories = async () => {
+       try {
+         const response = await getCategories()
+         categories.value = response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         console.error('åŠ è½½åˆ†ç±»å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const setCurrentImage = (index) => {
+       currentImageIndex.value = index
+     }
+ 
+     const showInquiryModal = () => {
+       showInquiry.value = true
+     }
+ 
+     const closeInquiryModal = () => {
+       showInquiry.value = false
+     }
+ 
+     const handleInquirySuccess = () => {
+       // è¯¢ä»·æˆåŠŸåçš„å¤„ç†
+       console.log('è¯¢ä»·æäº¤æˆåŠŸ')
+       emit('success')
+     }
+ 
+     const goToContact = () => {
+       router.push('/contact')
+     }
+ 
+     const goBack = () => {
+       router.back()
+     }
+ 
+     const handleClose = () => {
+       emit('close')
+     }
+ 
+     const handleImageError = (event) => {
+       console.error('å›¾ç‰‡åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥:', event.target.src)
+       // éšè—å¤±è´¥çš„å›¾ç‰‡
+       event.target.style.display = 'none'
+       // æ˜¾ç¤ºå ä½ç¬¦
+       const placeholder = event.target.parentElement.querySelector('.image-placeholder')
+       if (placeholder) {
+         placeholder.style.display = 'flex'
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const handleImageLoad = () => {
+       // å›¾ç‰‡åŠ è½½æˆåŠŸåï¼Œéšè—å ä½ç¬¦
+       const placeholder = document.querySelector('.main-image .image-placeholder')
+       if (placeholder) {
+         placeholder.style.display = 'none'
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const handleThumbnailError = (event) => {
+       event.target.style.display = 'none'
+       const placeholder = event.target.parentElement.querySelector('.thumbnail-placeholder')
+       if (placeholder) {
+         placeholder.style.display = 'flex'
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     const applyDetailImageStyles = () => {
+       // å¼ºåˆ¶åº”ç”¨äº§å“è¯¦æƒ…ä¸­å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ ·å¼
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         const detailImages = document.querySelectorAll('.product-description img, .product-details img')
+         detailImages.forEach(img => {
+           img.style.maxWidth = '95%'
+           img.style.width = 'auto'
+           img.style.height = 'auto'
+           img.style.margin = '10px auto'
+           img.style.display = 'block'
+           img.style.objectFit = 'contain'
+           img.style.borderRadius = '0px'
+           img.style.webkitBorderRadius = '0px'
+           img.style.mozBorderRadius = '0px'
+           
+           // ç›‘å¬å›¾ç‰‡åŠ è½½å®Œæˆäº‹ä»¶
+           img.onload = function() {
+             this.style.borderRadius = '0px'
+             this.style.webkitBorderRadius = '0px'
+             this.style.mozBorderRadius = '0px'
+           }
+         })
+       }, 100)
+     }
+ 
+     // ç›‘å¬å¼¹çª—æ˜¾ç¤ºçŠ¶æ€ï¼ŒåŠ è½½äº§å“æ•°æ®
+     watch(() => props.visible, (newVal) => {
+       if (newVal && props.productId) {
+         loadProduct()
+         loadCategories()
+       }
+     })
+ 
+     // ç›‘å¬äº§å“IDå˜åŒ–
+     watch(() => props.productId, (newVal) => {
+       if (newVal && props.visible) {
+         loadProduct()
+       }
+     })
+ 
+     return {
+       loading,
+       product,
+       categories,
+       currentImageIndex,
+       currentImage,
+       categoryName,
+       showInquiry,
+       imageDisplayMode,
+       setCurrentImage,
+       showInquiryModal,
+       closeInquiryModal,
+       handleInquirySuccess,
+       goToContact,
+       goBack,
+       handleClose,
+       handleImageError,
+       handleImageLoad,
+       handleThumbnailError,
+       getImageUrl,
+       applyDetailImageStyles
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped>
+ .product-detail-modal {
+   position: fixed;
